resources.string: MobileApp
"I love Specter, it made me able to easily gather all my institutions invoices and receipts and my job is now a pleasure!"
"I was pretty skeptical at first but after i tried the mobile app i realized Specter offered me so many options and so much versatility!."
"Who would have think that such a small app can change my life so much more than expected. I am so happy our institution has chosen this app."
"Not the conventional great app, but a creative one i can say surely! When i have problems the tech team always helps me! Great guys!"
Is Specter really free?
Absolutely. We only have the free plan that allows you to send unlimited invoices to an unlimited number of clients, using an unlimited number of institutions.
Are my invoices/receipts safe?

Keeping your data secure is one of our top priorities — that is why we did not spare any expenses when it comes to our encrypted server systems. This industry-leading setup enables us to sync your private invoicing data to the cloud.
Does Specter work on my Mac, PC and mobile device?

Absolutely — since Specter is a web-based application you will be able to keep track of your invoicing needs using any device with an internet connection — whether you are at home, in the office or on the go. Moreover we have a mobile app too!
